text: tavada ek dutayeku (yava ætteya), ohu allahge pæhædili ayavan obata samudiranaya kara penva (obagen) visvasaya taba dæhæmi kriyavan karannanva andhakarayen alokaya desata gena enneya. ebævin (obagen) kavurun (ættenma) allahva visvasa kara, dæhæmi kriyavan karanneda, ohuva svargayanhi ætulu vimata salasvanneya. evayehi diya dahara sadakal gala basiminma æta. sadakal ovun evayehi rændi sitinnaha. niyata vasayenma allah ohuta alamkaravat varaprasadayanma laba denneya
